name: OralRadiationDuringMedicationsForOsteoporosisInMenWithUrologyCare
title: Oral radiation during medications for osteoporosis in men with urology care
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values focuses on planned or actual oral radiation during the time men are receiving medications for osteoporosis as part of their urology care.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify planned or actual radiation during the therapy for osteoporosis in men receiving urology care.),(Inclusion Criteria: Oral Radiation, especially to the jaw),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
